entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
